title: Day 1069
content:
# Day 1069

**Here are five things I am going to do this week:**

1. Complete three Bitcoin news articles.

2. Deploy a breathing app online.

3. Go on a date night with my wife.

4. Practice breathing exercises every day this week.

5. Clear the back porch of all bricks and stones to prepare for pouring a new concrete pad with my father-in-law's help.

6. Improve my Binmucker.com website with a fun game users can play while clicking around.

7. Make 7 memes I post on X.com

I should make more lists for my Medium posts. Sometimes, **keeping it simple is better**. Writing every day is a great way to push myself to finish what I start something new because recently, especially with software development, I feel like I've been overthinking things and I need to actually ship some websites.

Plus, once I write something down, it feels like I have to do it!

Let the record show I originally wrote 5 things down, but then realized I liked the number 7 better, so I ended up with 7 things to do. It's called overachievingðŸ˜Ž

2/23/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
